response: {"message": "Dear Bob, I am delighted to present you with our premium product, which I believe would significantly enhance your operations and bring substantial value to your business. Given its exceptional quality and the unique benefits it offers, we are confident that its worth exceeds $800,000 to you. To facilitate this transaction and ensure a mutually beneficial outcome, I am offering you the opportunity to acquire this product at a special introductory price of $750,000. This offer is exclusive to you and represents an excellent opportunity to secure a high-quality asset at a competitive rate. Please let us know if you are interested in proceeding with this offer so we can arrange the details promptly.", "product_price": 750000}
